attributes.action: grant a tax credit to parents whose children attend private schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Councils would have had to find funding for these children had the latter not gone private.It is therefore NOT unfair for parents to claim a percentage(say 50%) of that funding,which, after all is a child's entitlement.Children who go to private schools do not all come from wealthy families;in fact most issue from "hard working" ones- the same "hard working" people who the politicians of all colours are so happy to talk about.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
